title: BBC Focus slab serif
content:
Hello Typophiles,

what is the clean, legible slab serif that the BBC Focus magazine uses?

Thank you in advance - just want to learn!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820093941im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bbcfocus_6627.jpg)
author: Atwe

comments.content:
Indeed it is. Thank you!

--- Tamas Ferencz ---
